seg.quote: She turned her head and looked directly at them.

sense.def:
Če nekaj storimo
directly
, storimo odkrito ali ne da bi vpletli koga drugega.

seg.quote: She never directly asked for money.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
directly above, below, or in front of something
, je natančno v položaju nad, pod ali pred nečim.

seg.quote: The sun was almost directly overhead.

sense.def:
Directly
pomeni zelo kmalu ali takoj.

seg.quote: I'll move back into my old room directly.
Directly he heard the door close he picked up the telephone.
